chapter.title: Supported Browsers
chapter.para: The applet is tested and working with Internet Explorer, Netscape, Opera, Mozilla (and derivatives) and Konqueror on various platforms. Test results are given below.

If you find problems with the browser/operating system/jvm combination of your choice, please send an email to jmol-users@lists.sf.net, stating the exact error (most browsers have a Java Console), and the versions of the browser, the operating system, and the java virtual machine that is used.

section.title: Testing results
section.para:
The JmolApplet has been tested successfully with the following system configurations:
Win32 (98/ME/2K/XP)
Microsoft Internet Explorer with Microsoft JVM Microsoft Internet Explorer with Sun Java Plugin >= 1.4 Netscape 4.* (slow performance) Netscape 7 with Sun Java Plugin >= 1.4 Mozilla with Sun Java Plugin >= 1.4
Mac OS X 10.3 Panther
Safari 1.2
Previous versions of OSX & Safari have significant problems
Linux/Unix
Mozilla >= 1.2.1 + Sun Java >= 1.4 Konqueror >= 3.1 + Sun Java >= 1.4
Mac OS 9
Netscape 4.7* marginal performance with limited functionality
